item.title: I tried to create a password generator to teach Python3 to children (bonus) * Completely remade
item.description: # It seems to be popular to change the password of my number card, so I made a password generator. Update: 2020/05/30 Actually, because I needed a password with an arbitrary number of digits, 1000 or more, at work… Since it’s just a matter of course, I also studied Python and made a password generator with the following specifications. Password generator specifications Password with any number of digits Mix English lowercase letters (or choose) Mix English capital letters (or choose) Mix symbols (or choose) 3 consecutive characters are repelled (123, abc, 987, XYZ, 121, etc.
